@GWRHelp thanks :)
@GWRHelp but he asked for DM after midnight and I was asleep. Not received e-voucher yet.
@GWRHelp I was charged full price for 1 of a pair of disabled adult tickets. Andy last night said he'd send across an e-voucher for the £25
@GWRHelp Hi Lewis. Any chance you could help with on-going ticket issue
@GWRHelp this has not been resolved. Please help.
@GWRHelp hi. Still not received code?
@GWRHelp hi. This has now been done.
@GWRHelp fab. Thank you!
@GWRHelp hi. There's no e-voucher showing in my account. Has this been done?
@GWRHelp thank you. Then yes please e-voucher would be great.
@GWRHelp okay. I can use that then. Thanks. Perhaps worth feeding back to web design folks though?
@GWRHelp how quickly can an e-voucher be used. Can I only do online bookings with it?
@GWRHelp surely you can refund my card? That takes minutes :/ this is website fault not user error.
@GWRHelp as in. The info I have put in is correct. So not user error. So I'd really prefer the money back.
@GWRHelp I'd really rather the money back. When I buy at station/ machine/other providers te discount is applied. I have 1 card not 2.
@GWRHelp not sure why. Glitch on website? Discount should have applied to both. Used to on the old website :/
@GWRHelp on your website. Ref: TKXLJLF5
@GWRHelp @GWRUK disabled railcard should have discounted both tickets! I'm out £25!
@GWRHelp @GWRUK I've been charged full price for 1 of a pair of tickets to London on 9th Dec... Even though I have a disabled railcard. :(

@elenacresci that's a lot of insanity in one story! @washingtonpost
@ArrivaTW I'll bite. Fewer not less. Brake not break. Anyway, I'm really not satisfied & would like to make a complaint. Do you have a form?
@ArrivaTW how does that actually alleviate problems on the Lisvane to Central service this AM?
@ArrivaTW have they? I've never had a response. Never seen any change. And I'm late for work because a 9 min journey has taken over 40 mins!
@ArrivaTW timetable looks the same to the one in operation in August/Sept. How has it changed for actual winter?
Apparently winter comes as a surprise to @ArrivaTW - no contingency. Hell for commuters. https://t.co/lY7zjCV4M7
. @ArrivaTW and the rude guard on the delayed and impossible to get on to 8:14? What about that?
. @ArrivaTW have you considered amending the timetable to reflect this. Winter weather should never be a surprise to a train operator
@ArrivaTW it would be useful do know what you're going to do about this? What is the issue today?
. @ArrivaTW TBH sorry really isn't good enough. Journey is 9 mins. I was at station for the 8:14. Still not in town at 8:39...
On 8:29 (arrived 8:34). Totally rammed. No room for more passengers at Llanishen & Heath High Level @ArrivaTW
@ArrivaTW is the 8:29 from Lisvane actually arriving?
If the 8:29 is even a fraction as full as normal there's no way anyone is getting on board. So much for getting to work on time @ArrivaTW
8:14 @ArrivaTW arrived at Lisvane. Too full to take on passengers. Unapologetic train guard claimed they were early (it arrived at 8:20)
